ygData.subject: Top Deck WAS: Digest Number 287
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually the very top deck on hte boat is only reachable by bards and I believed sowed people though I have not seen any one try.  If you attempt to get up
ygData.messageBody:
Actually the very top deck on hte boat is only reachable by bards and I
believed sowed people though I have not seen any one try. If you attempt
to get up while under the influence of Selo's look up and move forward and
you move upward very slowly. If you jump while moving forward it should
take about 3 or 4 jumps ot make itto the top. It is a great place to
practice you brass instruments skills while travelling throught the ocean
of tears =).

Treilanin Loreweaver

On Thu, 26 Aug 1999, Blair, Keith (Keith Blair) wrote:
<snip>
> I've seen people on the upper most deck and
> for the life of me can't figure out how to
> get up there. Anyone know?
>
